title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 700.5 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 700.5 - Location

State Regulations

Records shall be made available for public inspection and
copying at the office of the Department of Labor where the records are
regularly maintained, or at another location more convenient to the requester
if, in the discretion of the records access officer, the removal of the records
from the location where they are regularly maintained will not jeopardize the
preservation and safekeeping of the records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
700.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
